sentences: Mees ütles heade ööd ja lahkus.
context: "ütles" is the third-person singular past indicative form of the Estonian verb "ütlema" (to say/speak). It means 'he/she/it said' or 'they said' in English. This word specifically refers to someone speaking or uttering words, and is commonly used to report what someone has said in narrative contexts.
